Rewterz Threat Advisory ICS: Delta Electronics CNCSoft Vulnerabilities
text: CVE-2022-1405 CVSS:7.8 The affected product does not properly sanitize input while processing a specific project file, allowing a possible stack-based buffer overflow condition.

text: CVE-2022-1404 CVSS:3.3 The affected product does not properly sanitize input while processing a specific project file, allowing a possible out-of-bounds read condition.
